import React from 'react'; import {useState, useEffect,useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import products from "../products"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {Row,Col, Image, ListGroup,Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import axios from 'axios'; const ProductScreen = () => { const[product,setProduct] = useState({}); const {id: productId} = useParams(); return <> Go Back
